English Roots, Prefixes, and Suffixes

Jan 22, 2026 20 min read

è‹±è¯­å•è¯æ„è¯æ³•

å‰ç¼€

ç¬¬1èŠ‚ è¡¨ç¤ºå¦å®šæ„ä¹‰çš„å‰ç¼€

(1) çº¯å¦å®šå‰ç¼€

  • a-, an-: asymmetry (ä¸å¯¹ç§°), anhydrous (æ— æ°´çš„)
  • dis-: dishonest, dislike
  • in-, ig-, il-, im-, ir-:
    incapable, inability, ignoble, impossible,
    immoral, illegal, irregular
  • ne-, n-: none, neither, never
  • non-: nonsense
  • un-: unable, unemployment

(2) è¡¨ç¤ºâ€œé”™è¯¯â€çš„æ„ä¹‰

  • male-, mal-: malfunction, maladjustment (å¤±è°ƒ)
  • mis-: mistake, mislead
  • pseudo-: pseudonym (å‡å), pseudoscience (ä¼ªç§‘å­¦)

(3) è¡¨ç¤ºâ€œååŠ¨ä½œâ€çš„æ„æ€

  • de-: defend, demodulation (è§£è°ƒ)
  • dis-: disarm, disconnect
  • un-: unload, uncover

(4) è¡¨ç¤ºâ€œç›¸åã€ç›¸äº’å¯¹ç«‹â€çš„æ„æ€

  • anti-, ant-: antiknock (é˜²éœ‡), antiforeign (æ’å¤–çš„)
  • contra-, contre-, contro-: contradiction, controflow (é€†æµ)
  • counter-: counteraction, counterbalance
  • ob-, oc-, of-, op-: object, oppose, occupy
  • with-: withdraw, withstand

  • -ese: Chinese
  • -ish: English, Spanish

(9) è¡¨ç¤ºâ€œæ¯”è¾ƒç¨‹åº¦â€çš„å«ä¹‰

  • -er: greater
  • -ish: reddish, yellowish
  • -est: highest
  • -most: foremost, topmost

(10) å…¶ä»–å«ä¹‰

  • -less: å¦å®š
    countless, stainless, wireless

ç¬¬3èŠ‚ åŠ¨è¯åç¼€

åç¼€å«ä¹‰ä¸¾ä¾‹
-ize, -iseåšæˆï¼Œå˜æˆï¼Œâ€¦â€¦åŒ–modernize, mechanize, organize
-enæ˜¯æˆä¸ºï¼Œå¼•èµ·ï¼Œä½¿æœ‰quicken, weaken, soften, harden
-fyä½¿â€¦â€¦åŒ–ï¼Œä½¿æˆbeautify, purify, intensify, signify
-ishä½¿ï¼Œä»¤finish, abolish, diminish, establish
-ateæˆä¸ºâ€¦â€¦ï¼Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œä½œç”¨separate, operate, indicate

ç¬¬4èŠ‚ å‰¯è¯åç¼€

  • -ly: possibly, swiftly, simply
  • -ward, -wards: downward, inwards, upward
  • -ways: always, sideways
  • -wise: otherwise, clockwise
